subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jason Kidd recorded his 79th career triple-double in the Nets’ victory over Memphis on Monday night. With that, he surpassed Wilt Chamberlain for third place on the N.B.A. career list.
snippet: Jason Kidd recorded his 79th career triple-double in the Nets’ victory over Memphis on Monday night. With that, he surpassed Wilt Chamberlain for third place on the N.B.A. career list.
